patterns: What to pack for my trip
responses: Always pack: passport, medications, chargers, and comfortable shoes. The rest depends on your destination!
For tropical climates: swimwear, sunscreen, insect repellent. For cold weather: layers, gloves, warm hat.
I recommend packing light with versatile clothing. Don't forget travel adapters and any necessary visas!
Visa requirements vary by country and your nationality. Where are you planning to go?
Most countries require your passport to be valid for 6 months beyond your travel dates. Specific visa requirements depend on the destination.
I can check visa requirements if you tell me your destination and nationality.
Consider off-season travel, budget airlines, hostels, and local street food to save money!
Southeast Asia, Eastern Europe, and Central America offer great value for budget travelers.
Travel hacking with credit card points and booking in advance can help reduce costs significantly.

patterns: Is it safe to travel to...
responses: Check government travel advisories, get travel insurance, and research local customs for safety.
Most tourist destinations are safe with basic precautions. Avoid displaying valuables and learn emergency numbers.
Register with your embassy, share your itinerary, and keep digital copies of important documents for safety.
